channel.title: Router
channel.description:
Is there any way of disconnecting my router so i don't need to use one while on the internets/making a ps
and if its possible, start my ps without a router, reconnect it and still play online if i haven't port forwarded?
lol if your confused, just ask.

item.title: Router
item.dc:creator: @i_own_i1 i--own--i
item.description:
@i_own_i1 wrote:

i have a router with a modem also so i have to connect my internet throught the modem and router and computer so does that mean i dont need to port forward??? cuz if it does omfg iv probably fucked it up cuz i did port forward but not really properly… can some1 explain wut i need 2 do if i d/c my router and just want to get my server on the status page with my modem

Read full topic

item.title: Router
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

if you have a modem you don’t need to port forward. but if you have a modem and router in 1 you need to…

Read full topic

item.title: Router
item.dc:creator: @i_own_i1 i--own--i
item.description:
@i_own_i1 wrote:

omg this is like exactly what i want to do becuz iv gone through port forwarding and stuff an almost had it working but then i changed so other settings and fucked up my router lol and internet so i had to system resotore, but its all good now but i got a feeling my router isnt working completely right becuz instead of having 192… ip it just starts with 10…like it is without a router…but anyway can you explain the tcp port thing better cuz id say i do have it and i really wanna get my server up just using my modem.

Read full topic

item.title: Router

item.description:
@Strangex0rz wrote:

lol, i just read over it and its too complicated:

Is there anyway to turn off my router without distrupting my internet connection?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2007, 06:28:07 AM[/size][hr][quote=“xxl3th4lxx, post:2, topic:122760”]if you have a TCP port then yes you can do it if your using window.[/quote]
